summary: As a young man returns home after his first year away at college he recalls his senior year of high school and the iron-willed, big city girl that turned his world upside down.
cast: Nobuo Tobita|Toshihiko Seki|Yoko Sakamoto|Yuri Amano|Kae Araki|Jun'ichi Kanemaru|Ai Sat√¥|Aya Hisakawa|Tomokazu Seki|Hikaru Midorikawa|Rin Mizuhara|Sumi Shimamoto|Reiko Suzuki
keywords: friendship|studio ghibli|two word title|love|high school reunion
title: Puedo escuchar el mar
